name: BoomaZap
description: A crackling book infused with pure zap-zap.

name: SugoFlare
description: Radiates hotter than Nonna’s oven at Christmas.

description: Launches a spicy meatball of doom.

description: Unleashes a molten cheese storm from hell.

description: Freezes your enemies like Nonna’s basement fridge.

description: Stabs with the cold fury of winter in Napoli.

name: SicilianRoses
description: Thorns explode like mamma’s pressure cooker.

description: Blinds and burns with holy garlic fury.
